title: VidGhee
blurb: “Clarify” your videos: batch transcode, denoise, deinterlace, stabilize, trim, and optimize with reproducible recipes.
description: VidGhee is a deterministic video processing toolkit that wraps ffmpeg and optional GPU paths into portable, versioned recipes. It focuses on practical improvements—noise reduction, deinterlacing, stabilization, scaling, standards-compliant loudness, and efficient codecs—while preserving detail where it matters. Outputs include clean masters, frame/hash manifests, and sidecar metadata.

versions.notes: Recipe engine v2, GPU presets (NVENC/QSV/VTB), loudness normalization.
Stabilization + grain-preserve tuning, ProRes/DNxHR mezzanine targets.
Denoise presets; deinterlace; deterministic CRF ladders.
Initial alpha with basic H.264/H.265 pipelines.
